channel.title: RuneDesire-X [317] Updated again
channel.description:
[b]Welcome to RuneDesire-X[/b]
[size=8pt]First of all, before we start if you have any name suggestions please post them, thanks.[/size]
Also i am using this base : Delta. But i will be editing alot.
[center] [b]So here we go. I am starting a new server development team and im looking for decent staff and beta testers, if your a beta tester you dont just get to play first, you have to acctually tell me about Dupes and Bugs ect.
I am currently looking for :
[s]Web Designer[/s] Co - Web Designer [s]Hoster :[/s] Co - Coder(s) : Beta Testers : ([s]1[/s],2,3)[/b] Moderators : (1,2) Admins : (1,2) [/center]
Please fill in your apps in this format. If it has a * Next to it, it means its a must have (you must put it.) [code]*Name: *Position applying for : *Experience (include how long): *MSN : Skype : Proof : [/code]
Contact me at :
Msn : [email]teh-dagon-hai@hotmail.co.uk[/email] Skype : callum.init.bruv
[center] [IMG]http://i336.photobucket.com/albums/n360/archiz2/Runescape%20icons/Strength.gif[/img]Combat System[IMG]http://i336.photobucket.com/albums/n360/archiz2/Runescape%20icons/Strength.gif[/img] 70% Dragon Claws, they work but don't spec on Npc's, this is easy enough to fix. 100% Old School Ranging, i personally prefer this but i may change. 80% Mage, unfortunatly, autocasting dosent work. 100% Godswords, Armadyl isnt overpowered, Stances and walking.
[IMG]http://i916.photobucket.com/albums/ad9/yoshimtu/Runescape/Herblore.gif[/img]Skilling System[IMG]http://i916.photobucket.com/albums/ad9/yoshimtu/Runescape/Herblore.gif[/img]
All skills working, haven't checked the percentages but i know they are all over 90%.
[b]Images[/b] [/center]
[center]New Home, Complete. [IMG]http://i872.photobucket.com/albums/ab289/94Bil/Home-11.png[/img]
Shops, 100%.
[IMG]http://i872.photobucket.com/albums/ab289/94Bil/Home-12.png[/img] [IMG]http://i872.photobucket.com/albums/ab289/94Bil/hometh.png[/img]
Godsword Stances, 100%.
[IMG]http://i872.photobucket.com/albums/ab289/94Bil/Home-13.png[/img]
Alchemy Working 100%
[IMG]http://i872.photobucket.com/albums/ab289/94Bil/Home-14.png[/img]
[/center]
Will add more info as i add more updates. Please suggest stuff for the server and may RuneDesire-X be with you.
Thanks for reading.
[url=http://OnlineSupport@runedesire.org]OnlineSupport@runedesire.org[/url]
Server is being released soon, as i have finished coding for now and have a hoster.
BETA MODE
[img]http://www.fubergen.com/check/check.php?s=runedesire.servegame.com&p=43594[/img] <----- Does this class as advertising?

item.title: RuneDesire-X [317] Updated again
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

You should let the Administrators spawn on the server. However, you can make it so you can give them the rights to let them spawn instead of having it for all Administrators.

Nevertheless,

Good luck with the development.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneDesire-X [317] Updated again
item.dc:creator: @Sanity_Maiden Sanity Maiden
item.description:
@Sanity_Maiden wrote:

Welcome to RuneDesire-X

[size=8pt]First of all, before we start if you have any name suggestions please post them, thanks.[/size]

Also i am using this base :
Delta.
But i will be editing alot.

[center] [b]So here we go.
I am starting a new server development team and im looking for decent staff and beta testers, if your a beta tester you dont just get to play first, you have to acctually tell me about Dupes and Bugs ect.

I am currently looking for :

Web Designer
Co - Web Designer
Hoster :
Co - Coder(s) :
Beta Testers : (1,2,3)[/b]
Moderators : (1,2)
Admins : (1,2) [/center]

Please fill in your apps in this format. If it has a * Next to it, it means its a must have (you must put it.)

*Name: *Position applying for : *Experience (include how long): *MSN : Skype : Proof :

Contact me at :

Msn : teh-dagon-hai@hotmail.co.uk
Skype : callum.init.bruv

[center]
Combat System
70% Dragon Claws, they work but don’t spec on Npc’s, this is easy enough to fix.
100% Old School Ranging, i personally prefer this but i may change.
80% Mage, unfortunatly, autocasting dosent work.
100% Godswords, Armadyl isnt overpowered, Stances and walking.

Skilling System

All skills working, haven’t checked the percentages but i know they are all over 90%.

Images [/center]

[center]New Home, Complete.

Home-11.png1022×349

Shops, 100%.


hometh.png395×1023

Godsword Stances, 100%.

Alchemy Working 100%

[/center]

Will add more info as i add more updates.
Please suggest stuff for the server and may RuneDesire-X be with you.

Thanks for reading.

OnlineSupport@runedesire.org

Server is being released soon, as i have finished coding for now and have a hoster.
